alert.note: Alert for Bates; Lafayette (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 7:37PM CST until December 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHARITON...SOUTHERN RANDOLPH...HENRY...SOUTHEASTERN BATES...PETTIS...SOUTH CENTRAL CARROLL...HOWARD...SALINE...EASTERN LAFAYETTE...COOPER AND JOHNSON COUNTIES... At 736 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bosworth to near Concordia to near Clinton, moving northeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Sedalia, Warrensburg, Marshall, Clinton, Boonville, Higginsville, Windsor, Knob Noster, Fayette, Concordia, Slater, Sweet Springs, Rich Hill, Glasgow, Whiteman Air Force Base, La Monte, New Franklin, Waverly, Pilot Grove and Smithton. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 50 and 115. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
